title: Trade Deadline Day; Chiefs barely beat Giants; Scott Pioli; Power Rankings
itunes:title: Trade Deadline Day; Chiefs barely beat Giants; Scott Pioli; Power Rankings
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager and DeAngelo Hall open up exploring potential trade scenarios on trade deadline day and then break down the Kansas City Chiefs sloppy victory over the New York Giants on Monday Night Football; then they get into 'We in or We out' and answer if the Minnesota Vikings season is over and if you trust Mike White or Carson Wentz more; they are also joined by Scott Pioli for insights on the Los Angeles Rams going all in and Dan Hanzus for his latest edition of Power Rankings.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
